Thoth-Station
-------------

.. raw:: html

  <p style="text-align:right;"><i>Resurrected ancient deities helping humans with software development.</i></p>

.. image:: https://thoth-station.ninja/images/thoth-station.png
   :alt: Thoth Station logo
   :align: center
   :width: 70%
